message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $18,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns. However,  $18,000 is a fair starting point considering the true value of this product.  To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $16,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway.  Let's close the gap - I'm willing to accept $14,500. This is a very fair offer considering the value you'll be getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really hoping we can meet at a price that works for both of us.
